passwordExchanged.text: What were you thinking about when you gave me your password?

phoneStolen.text: Nothing of this would have happened if you had trusted me. It's your fault.

talked.text: Go away, we have nothing to talk about.

passwordExchanged.text: I can't believe you gave Alison your password.
Did you really think she was going to be your friend? I can't believe it was that easy.
Hahahaha!!! Seriously, I'm cracking up at you.

phoneFound.text: Hahahaha!!! I can't believe you didn't have a locking pattern on your mobile.
I thought it would be harder...

phoneFound.text_male: It's going to be a funny day. Now everyone thinks you're actually a fucking poof who likes it all.
phoneFound.text_female: It's going to be a funny day. Now everyone thinks you're actually a fucking vicious whore.

phoneNotFound.text: Look who's here. And I thought you wouldn't show up today.
Still without phone? Hahaha. It wasn't that hard to find if you would have looked well.
Where did you come from? Hahaha.
